stories.title: Germany to supply Ukraine with anti-tank weapons: Scholz

stories.text:
Hey everyone, I want to integrate subscription payments in my app. We are bootstrapped and around 10K MRR. What should be integrate for subscription payments?

2 popular options are strip subscriptions and charge bee.

Strip subscriptions API looks fairly simple to add. Should I just go ahead with that?
stories.title: Ask HN: Stripe subscription vs. chargebee? What to choose and why?
GitHub’s database of security advisories is now open source
Show HN: Set custom text in Mac menu bar (minimalistic) – Issues welcome

stories.text:
Considering the current Russia/Ukraine conflict, and the wartime travel restrictions for men, it feels relevant to ask this question to a wider audience, regardless of whether they are pro anyone, neutral, or feel mostly clueless about the war.

Is "military aged male" a morally legitimate phrase, to be used without further criticism, or should the expression have the same negative connotations as the various types of social repression against women?
stories.title: Ask HN: What do you think of the expression “military aged male”?
